oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Ocoee Whitewater Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of the exterior of the Ocoee Whitewater Center located inside the Cherokee National Forest. There are several people kayaking in the body of water in front of the building. Features a divided back with narrative and handwritten correspondence on reverse. May 2001 postmark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lee, Murray
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Cherokee National Forest (Tenn.); Copperhill (Tenn.); Polk County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kayaks; People; Bodies of water; Sports & recreation facilities; Trees
